titleStmt.title: The merchants new-royall-exchaunge framed at Roan, and brought ouer to be set vp in England. Or, A law-booke for English merchants.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1547-1559 : Henry II). Proclamations. 1556-03.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for Cutbert Burbey, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Swanne,

notesStmt.note: With a translation of the edict of Henry II, dated March 1556, establishing the royal exchange in Rouen.
Running title reads: The merchants new royall exchange.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
